    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int port)
       throws IOException
        The server has as job to make sure all attached clients are managed. 1) join the server on the clientAcceptor(); 2) Register commands inbound to this server PC 3) Process commands via servlets 4) Send out messages via network.
        Parameters:
        port - integer number of the port to open the socket listner service on.
        Throws:
        IOException

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runnable thread part of the server. Designed to loop forever with use of while(true). pollingTime is fixed
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Parameters:
        -
        -
        -

      • getDELIMITER2

        public static String getDELIMITER2()
        Delimiter 2 handles the sign used to replace any spaces users use Within delimiter 1. Example: MOVEROWCOLLUMN

      • getDELIMITER1

        public static String getDELIMITER1()
        Delimiter 1 handles the sign used in network communication to filter command from payload. Example: COMMANDPAYLOADCOMMANDPAYLOAD.
